affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Undying saps the life from enemy Heroes in an area, dealing damage and stealing Strength for the duration.
notes:
The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.
The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.
cmb:
70/90/110/130
10/8/6/4
lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
name: undying_decay

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Redirects the flow of energy through a target friendly or enemy unit, healing or damaging it depending on how many units are near Undying.  Each unit loses health as part of the cost.
notes: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.
attrib:
DAMAGE/HEAL PER UNIT: 18/22/26/30
RADIUS: 1300
MAX UNITS: 10/12/14/16
cmb:
100/110/120/130
24/18/12/6
lore: Even his allied Heroes feel despair in Undying's presence.
name: undying_soul_rip

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
notes:
Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.
Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.
If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.
attrib:
TOMBSTONE HEALTH: 175/350/525/700
TOMBSTONE DURATION: 15/20/25/30
ZOMBIE SPAWN RADIUS: 600/800/1000/1200
DEATHLUST FLAT HEALTH THRESHOLD: 100/200/300/400
DEATHLUST PCT HEALTH THRESHOLD: 20%/25%/30%/35%
ZOMBIE SPAWN INTERVAL: 3
cmb:
120/130/140/150
60
lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
name: undying_tombstone

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura. This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow. When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Undying is healed when affected units die in range, regardless of who killed it.
Dying illusions don't trigger the heal.
Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.
attrib:
DURATION: 30
MAX DAMAGE AMP: 20%/25%/30%
MIN DAMAGE AMP: 1%
MAX MOVE SLOW: 20%
MIN MOVE SLOW: 1%
DEATH HEAL (HEROES): 6%
DEATH HEAL (CREEPS): 2%
SCEPTER MAX DAMAGE AMP: 30%/35%/40%
SCEPTER MIN DAMAGE AMP: 1%
SCEPTER DEATH HEAL (HEROES): 10%
SCEPTER DEATH HEAL (CREEPS): 3%
cmb:
100/100/100
75
lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
name: undying_flesh_golem
